name: Battle Direct
description:
Battle direct is a top down open space Sci-Fi spaceship shooter game. It features dazzling special effects that comes along with a funny Sci-Fi political story that will keep you gripped and you will just want to keep playing to unlock more levels and find out more about the galaxy. There is an educational part of each story where you get to learn simple politics terminology. Example: whats the difference between "Social Democracy" and "Democratic Socialism"??? Find out by unlocking that level.

       In the game you are an Aelian space pilot and your purpose is to collect resources for your people and yourself. As you play, you get better, you get upgrades, you buy better spaceships and better weapons. You unlock levels that leads to more resources and better stats. All levels can be played as many times as you like to gather the amount of resources needed for any reason from that level. All levels have a unique BOSS. When a BOSS killed then it takes at least a day until it re-spawns.    

GAMEPLAY HELP

All actions are performed with mouse left button.

–scrolling: left mouse button hold and move.

–Dragging: left mouse button hold and move.

–clicking: left mouse button click.

During battle the space-bar can be used to get the NEXT TARGET.

Also buttons 1-8 can be used:

–1: Laser fire

–2 Rocket fire

–3 Shield activation

–4 Magnet activation

–5 EMP bomb fire

–6 Health

–7 Warp speed

— Escape

By clicking and holding buttons 1-4 for half a second they go to Auto mode so Rockets for example get fired automatically finding targets by their own.
